definition: being or characteristic of government by representation in which citizens exercise power through elected officers and representatives, an item of information that is typical of a class or group
details:
adjective
- being or characteristic of government by representation in which citizens exercise power through elected officers and representatives
= example: being or characteristic of government by representation in which citizens exercise power through elected officers and representatives
- standing for something else
= example: standing for something else
- serving to represent or typify
= example: serving to represent or typify
noun
- an item of information that is typical of a class or group
= synonyms: example
- a member of the United States House of Representatives
= synonyms: congressman, congresswoman
- a person who represents others
- an advocate who represents someone else's policy or purpose
= synonyms: voice
